main.name: Ariel Leon Flores
main.bio: Thank you for taking a look at my Portfolio! I'm Ariel, a trilingual(English,French, Spanish) Lighthouse Labs graduate with extensive Experience in Sales, Hospitality and Customer service. As an Afro-Latino, I have taken part in multiple events to discuss intersectionality and belonging within the work place as well as help coordinate networking opportunities for my communities. I enjoy learning new skills and hope that this new career will allow me to focus and grow more each day
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Scholarship recipient for intensive Web-Development Bootcamp where I learned Javascript, NodeJS, HTML, CSS, ReactJS, Ruby on Rails as well as Databases and Data Modeling

projects.title: Fresh BsQt
projects.category: Grocery Delivery App aiming to offer delivery options for small neighborhood stores within a specified range of users' current location in order to promote buying fresh & Local.

projects.title: Jungle
projects.category: A mini e-commerce application built with Rails 4.2. It is a responsive MPA using a Rails backend with Active Record.

projects.title: Scheduler
projects.category: A Interview appointment creation tool built as a Single Page App with React

projects.title: Tweeter
projects.category: A single page Twitter clone using JavaScript, AJAX, Express and MongoDB
